+import React from "react"
+import { View, StyleSheet, Image, Dimensions, Text, TouchableOpacity } from "react-native"
+import { RFValue } from 'react-native-responsive-fontsize'
+const { width, height } = Dimensions.get('screen');
+const halfHeight = RFValue(167, 406);
+const halfWidth = RFValue(153, 375);
+
+const Screen1 = (props) => {
+    return (
+        <View style={styles.container}>
+            <View style={styles.topView}></View>
+            <View style={styles.bodyView}>
+                <View style={styles.viewAdd}></View>
+                <Text style={styles.text}>Empowering Artisans,</Text>
+                <Text style={styles.text}> Farmers & Micro Business</Text>
+                <Image
+                    source={require('../image/cham.png')}
+                    resizeMode="contain"
+                    style={styles.icon} />
+                <TouchableOpacity
+                    onPress={() => props.onPress()}
+                    style={styles.touchableOpacityStyle}>
+                    <Text style={styles.textTouchStyle}>Next</Text>
+                </TouchableOpacity>
+            </View>
+            <View style={{position: 'absolute', backgroundColor: 'red', bottom: 0, top: 0, left: 0, right: 0}}>
+                <Image
+                    source={require('../image/nen.png')}
+                    resizeMode="contain" />
+            </View>
+        </View>
+    )
+}
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+    container: { flex: 1 },
+    topView: { height: '40%', backgroundColor: '#33907C' },
+    bodyView: { height: '60%', backgroundColor: 'white', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' },
+    imageView: {
+        height: RFValue(334, 812),
+        backgroundColor: 'white',
+        position: 'absolute',
+        marginHorizontal: 10
+    },
+    text: {
+        fontFamily: 'Montserrat-Bold',
+        fontSize: 20,
+        color: '#33907C',
+        fontWeight: '500'
+    },
+    touchableOpacityStyle: {
+        backgroundColor: '#33907C',
+        borderRadius: 20,
+        width: '90%',
+        alignItems: 'center',
+        justifyContent: 'center'
+    },
+    textTouchStyle: {
+        color: 'white',
+        fontFamily: 'Montserrat-ExtraBold',
+        fontSize: 18,
+        padding: 9,
+        marginBottom: 5,
+        fontWeight: '600'
+    },
+    icon: { marginVertical: 30 },
+    viewAdd: { height: '50%' }
+
+
+})
+export default Screen1
